Some cards, relics and events will increase curse points. The higher the curse points is, the higher the chance of appearing cursed enemies(50% chance when 10 points or above). Cursed enemies will drop more gold when defeated. When curse points reaches 10 or above, #yLord #yOf #yThe #yJammed will take part in each combat.

When Blue guon stone triggered, increase the #yBlock by #b10 you gained at the start of your turn.

Whenever an enemy dies, gain #b8 times #yBlock of the number of enemies killed in the room.

When the decoy is destroyed, apply #b10 #yPoison to ALL enemies.
When there is decoy in the combat, the effect of #yShadow #yBullets certainly be triggered.
The maximum HP of the decoy is equal to the maximum HP of the first enemy in the room (no more than #b100 ).
